summary: Insurance company push the callback notification to partners once the policy has been cancelled successfully

query.name: lapseType
query.description: enumï¼š expiration: policy expired. end: the customer has used up the sum insured amount, policy end.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/digital/insurance/notificationlapse')
request.add_api_parameter("orderNo", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("thirdOrderNo", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("policyNo", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("lapseTime", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("lapseType", "enum\uFF1A expiration: policy expired. end: the customer has used up the sum insured amount, policy end.")
request.add_api_parameter("message", "expire")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/digital/insurance/notificationlapse')
request.add_api_param('orderNo', '1234')
request.add_api_param('thirdOrderNo', '1234')
request.add_api_param('policyNo', '1234')
request.add_api_param('lapseTime', '1234')
request.add_api_param('lapseType', 'enum\uFF1A expiration: policy expired. end: the customer has used up the sum insured amount, policy end.')
request.add_api_param('message', 'expire')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
